DOC.brief_summary: N=15 mothers with Borderline Personality Disorder who had young children (aged 0-6 years) participated in a 12-week training program. To estimate the participants' impairment, parental stress and psychological distress were assessed before the training. After the training, participants and trainers were asked to provide feedback regarding the valuation of and the changes due to the training.
DOC.brief_title: Parenting Skills for Mothers With Borderline Personality Disorder: A Newly Developed Group Training Program
DOC.criteria: Borderline diagnosis in mothers Infants between 6 months and 6 years Mothers and their children must be in regular contact with each other Acute child endangerment Maternal acute suicidality
